languages.text: "Ты лишь оттянула неизбежную смерть в когтях варпа, Вени'Идира. Ты могла попросить избавления, но не стала. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты лишь оттянула неизбежную смерть в когтях варпа, Вени'Идира. Ты могла попросить избавления, но не стала. Почему?"

languages.text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Ты лишь оттянула неизбежную смерть в когтях варпа, Вени'Идира. Ты могла попросить избавления, но не стала. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: «Solo ha conseguido retrasar su muerte inevitable en las garras de la disformidad, Veni'Idira. Podría haber obtenido la liberación, pero no lo ha hecho. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: 「<歪み>の爪による避けられない死を先送りにしただけだ、ヴェニイディラ。解放を望むこともできたが、そうしなかった。なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: “亚空间的利爪攫住了你，你不过是在推迟不可避免的死亡而已，帷者伊迪拉。你本可以寻求解脱，但你却没这么做，这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euren unvermeidlichen Tod in den Klauen des Warp nur unmerklich verzögert, Veni'Idira. Ihr hättet um Erlösung bitten können, aber das habt Ihr nicht. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: « Vous n'avez fait que retarder votre mort des mains du Warp, Veni'Idira. Vous auriez pu demander la délivrance, mais vous ne l'avez pas fait. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
"You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"

languages.text: "Veni'İdira, öteboyutun pençelerindeki kaçınılmaz ölümünü yalnızca erteledin. Kurtuluş isteyebilirdin ancak bunu yapmadın. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "You have merely delayed your inevitable death in the claws of the warp, Veni'Idira. You could have asked for deliverance, but you did not. Why?"
